briefTitle: Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of VR506 Using a New Inhaler for the Treatment of Asthma
officialTitle: A Randomised Double-blind, Parallel Group, Dose-ranging Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of VR506 From a New Dry Powder Inhaler in Subjects With Severe Persistent Asthma Requiring Oral Corticosteroid Therapy.
summary: To evaluate the clinical efficacy, safety, tolerability and dose-response relationship, using oral corticosteroid (OCS) modulation, of 3 different doses of VR506 using a twice daily regimen from a new dry powder inhaler (nDPI) for 16 weeks in subjects with severe persistent asthma requiring OCS therapy, i.e. Step 5 treatment as defined by modified Global Initiative for Asthma (GINA) guidelines 2011.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Prednisone/Prednisolone Dose for Analysis (PDA) at End of Study (Week 16)
